WITH CombinedPosts AS ( SELECT post_idx, post_id, post_name, post_title, post_contents, post_likes, post_created_date, post_updated_date, deleted_yn, 1 AS priority FROM post_TB p LEFT JOIN follow_TB f ON p.post_id = f.following_id WHERE f.follower_id = #{user_id} AND p.deleted_yn = 'N' AND TO_DATE(post_updated_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') >= (SYSDATE - 7) UNION SELECT post_idx, post_id, post_name, post_title, post_contents, post_likes, post_created_date, post_updated_date, deleted_yn, 2 AS priority FROM post_TB WHERE deleted_yn = 'N' AND TO_DATE(post_updated_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') >= (SYSDATE - 7) ), NumberedPosts AS ( SELECT post_idx, post_id, post_name, post_title, post_contents, post_likes, post_created_date, post_updated_date, deleted_yn, priority, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY post_idx, post_id, post_name, post_title, post_contents, post_likes, post_created_date, post_updated_date, deleted_yn ORDER BY priority) AS rn FROM CombinedPosts ) SELECT post_idx, post_id, post_name, post_title, post_contents, post_likes, post_created_date, post_updated_date, deleted_yn, priority FROM NumberedPosts WHERE rn = 1 ORDER BY priority, CASE WHEN priority = 1 THEN TO_DATE(post_created_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') END DESC, CASE WHEN priority = 2 THEN post_likes END DESC, TO_DATE(post_updated_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') DESC
